title: Bug 123727: 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions not working
OB: When using the 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions in a chart, they do not work as expected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Create a report parameter. 3. Drag a chart to the layout. 4. In the chart dialogue, navigate to the 'select data' tab and click the 'filters' button. 5. Set two filter conditions, one using the 'Top N' function and the other using the report parameter. 6. Run the report to observe the incorrect behavior.
